description:
gopprof: change /pprof/{heap,profile,symbol} to
 /debug/pprof/{heap,profile,symbol} to match the endpoints
 created by net/http/pprof.

messages.text:
I don't believe this change is necessary.
ParseProfileURL already takes care of the
possibility of a prefix before these paths
(in this case, /debug).

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

subject: code review 5564069: gopprof: change /pprof/{heap,profile,symbol} to
